meanings.definition: The belief in or worship of more than one god.
meanings.sent1: Polytheism was common in ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: Some cultures practice polytheism, while others believe in a single god.
meanings.sent3: The debate over which god to pray to in polytheism must get confusing!
meanings.sent4: In the world of polytheism, each god has their own unique powers and responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: Polytheism allows for a diverse array of deities to be worshipped.

meanings.definition: The doctrine of or belief in more than one god.
meanings.sent1: Polytheism was prevalent in ancient societies.
meanings.sent2: The concept of polytheism contrasts with monotheism.
meanings.sent3: Imagine the chaos of a polytheism family reunion with all those gods!
meanings.sent4: Polytheism can be seen as a rich tapestry of divine beings.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of polytheism lies in the multitude of gods to choose from.
